__e: Oh,10 years just made me want to find you more.

But I worry so much about her. So I took her with me without informing you.
I told you he can't come here, so how could he?
I know someone kept him alive for us.
We found the assailant. And we made him understand he'd never do it again.
I only saw it as broken, so I made sure I had enough to survive in it.
Hey, I heard you dumped the broad. Good for you. I almost got trapped the same way.
And I would've made sure she was here today, but I don't know where she is.
He was the one that stopped what was happening to you.
A long time ago, I made decisions that meant I was gonna go through life alone... but I didn't have anybody standing at the threshold to warn me.
How she made you feel pretty again for a little while?
Which, let's face it, is a hell of a lot more than he ever thought about with us.
- It's been a long time since someone took care of me like that.
I'm sure he was the kind of father who provided for his family.
I know how you cared for her.
I want to be able to take care of them like they took care of me.

Before I give the signal, steer people out of the away.
I'm going to stay here now and take care of you like you took care of me.
Thanks for gathering so many of us here again today.
This man... he raised me and took care of the king.
It looks like I was worried about you when I should've been worried about us.
I was worried about you, and he was a doctor, but he told someone, and now... And now this bad man knows.
I sought only advice, towards worry for a man I hold as brother.
All I ever cared about was killing, and I can't even do that right anymore.
You mean, now I can carry him, just because I was worried about you?
